# Sitemap for content discovery
Sitemap: https://www.romanulislam.com/sitemap.xml

# Content usage guidance
Usage:
- Content is intended for general health education only
- Not a substitute for professional medical advice
- Attribution appreciated when referencing content

# Crawling preference
Crawl-delay: 5
